Name: Gemscape
About the game: Swap, match and solve puzzles to explore world of Gemscape! Start your adventure and play adorable puzzle match-3 game! World of match-3 fun, an all-new free game start your exciting adventure with brave sorceress Alexa and help her to save magic island. An exciting adventure is calling you! Ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun! On this fun journey, you will solve exciting puzzles, receive coins for unlocking new levels, use boosters to continue your saga and become the last hope to save the Flying Islands and their magical inhabitants!
